select * from `clients` where `clients`.`client_id` in ('')

select exists(select * from `reminders` where `reminder_status` = 'due' and `reminder_userid` = 1) as `exists`

select `users`.*, `category_users`.`categoryuser_categoryid` as `pivot_categoryuser_categoryid`, `category_users`.`categoryuser_userid` as `pivot_categoryuser_userid` from `users` inner join `category_users` on `users`.`id` = `category_users`.`categoryuser_userid` where `category_users`.`categoryuser_categoryid` = 1
select * from `projects` where `project_id` = '1' limit 1

select count(*) as aggregate from `projects` left join `clients` on `clients`.`client_id` = `projects`.`project_clientid` left join `categories` on `categories`.`category_id` = `projects`.`project_categoryid` left join `users` on `users`.`id` = `projects`.`project_creatorid` left join `pinned` on `pinned`.`pinnedresource_id` = `projects`.`project_id` and `pinned`.`pinnedresource_type` = 'project' and `pinned`.`pinned_userid` = 1 left join `reminders` on `reminders`.`reminderresource_id` = `projects`.`project_id` and `reminders`.`reminderresource_type` = 'project' and `reminders`.`reminder_userid` = 1 where 1 = 1 and `project_type` = 'project' and `project_id` = '1' and `project_visibility` = 'visible'

select *, (SELECT filefolder_id
FROM file_folders
WHERE filefolder_projectid = projects.project_id
LIMIT 1)
AS default_folder_id, (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM tasks
WHERE task_projectid = projects.project_id)
AS count_all_tasks, (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM tasks
WHERE task_projectid = projects.project_id
AND task_status IN('completed', 2))
AS count_completed_tasks, (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM tasks
WHERE task_projectid = projects.project_id
AND task_status NOT IN('completed', 2))
AS count_pending_tasks, (SELECT COALESCE(count_completed_tasks/count_all_tasks*100, 0))
AS task_based_progress, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(bill_final_amount), 0.00)
FROM invoices
WHERE bill_projectid = projects.project_id
AND bill_invoice_type = 'onetime')
AS sum_invoices_all, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_amount), 0.00)
FROM payments
WHERE payment_projectid = projects.project_id
AND payment_type = 'invoice')
AS sum_all_payments, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(bill_final_amount), 0.00)
FROM invoices
WHERE bill_projectid = projects.project_id
AND bill_invoice_type = 'onetime'
AND bill_status = 'due')
AS sum_invoices_due, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(bill_final_amount), 0.00)
FROM invoices
WHERE bill_projectid = projects.project_id
AND bill_invoice_type = 'onetime'
AND bill_status = 'overdue')
AS sum_invoices_overdue, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(bill_final_amount), 0.00)
FROM invoices
WHERE bill_projectid = projects.project_id
AND bill_invoice_type = 'onetime'
AND bill_status NOT IN ('paid, draft'))
AS sum_invoices_unpaid, (SELECT COALESCE(sum_invoices_all - sum_all_payments, 0.00))
AS sum_outstanding_balance, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(bill_final_amount), 0.00)
FROM invoices
WHERE bill_projectid = projects.project_id
AND bill_invoice_type = 'onetime'
AND bill_status = 'paid')
AS sum_invoices_paid, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(expense_amount), 0.00)
FROM expenses
WHERE expense_projectid = projects.project_id)
AS sum_expenses, (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM files
WHERE fileresource_type = 'project'
AND fileresource_id = projects.project_id)
AS count_files, (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM tickets
WHERE ticket_status NOT IN (2)
AND ticket_projectid = projects.project_id)
AS count_tickets_open, (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM tickets
WHERE ticket_status = 2
AND ticket_projectid = projects.project_id)
AS count_tickets_closed, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(timer_time)
FROM timers
WHERE timer_status = 'stopped'
AND timer_projectid = projects.project_id), 0)
AS sum_hours from `projects` left join `clients` on `clients`.`client_id` = `projects`.`project_clientid` left join `categories` on `categories`.`category_id` = `projects`.`project_categoryid` left join `users` on `users`.`id` = `projects`.`project_creatorid` left join `pinned` on `pinned`.`pinnedresource_id` = `projects`.`project_id` and `pinned`.`pinnedresource_type` = 'project' and `pinned`.`pinned_userid` = 1 left join `reminders` on `reminders`.`reminderresource_id` = `projects`.`project_id` and `reminders`.`reminderresource_type` = 'project' and `reminders`.`reminder_userid` = 1 where 1 = 1 and `project_type` = 'project' and `project_id` = '1' and `project_visibility` = 'visible' order by CASE WHEN pinned.pinned_id IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, `pinned`.`pinned_id` desc, `project_id` desc limit 35 offset 0
select * from `tags` where `tags`.`tagresource_id` in (1) and `tags`.`tagresource_type` = 'project'

select `users`.*, `projects_assigned`.`projectsassigned_projectid` as `pivot_projectsassigned_projectid`, `projects_assigned`.`projectsassigned_userid` as `pivot_projectsassigned_userid` from `users` inner join `projects_assigned` on `users`.`id` = `projects_assigned`.`projectsassigned_userid` where `projects_assigned`.`projectsassigned_projectid` in (1)

select `users`.*, `projects_manager`.`projectsmanager_projectid` as `pivot_projectsmanager_projectid`, `projects_manager`.`projectsmanager_userid` as `pivot_projectsmanager_userid` from `users` inner join `projects_manager` on `users`.`id` = `projects_manager`.`projectsmanager_userid` where `projects_manager`.`projectsmanager_projectid` in (1)
select count(*) as aggregate from `customfields` where `customfields_type` = 'projects' and `customfields_standard_form_status` = 'enabled' and `customfields_status` = 'enabled'

select count(*) as aggregate from `projects` left join `clients` on `clients`.`client_id` = `projects`.`project_clientid` left join `categories` on `categories`.`category_id` = `projects`.`project_categoryid` left join `users` on `users`.`id` = `projects`.`project_creatorid` left join `pinned` on `pinned`.`pinnedresource_id` = `projects`.`project_id` and `pinned`.`pinnedresource_type` = 'project' and `pinned`.`pinned_userid` = 1 left join `reminders` on `reminders`.`reminderresource_id` = `projects`.`project_id` and `reminders`.`reminderresource_type` = 'project' and `reminders`.`reminder_userid` = 1 where 1 = 1 and `project_type` = 'project' and `project_id` = '1' and `project_visibility` = 'visible'
